name: Boss?
description:
Oh no, no one is working!  Do your best to convince people to get back to work before the day ends.  Be the boss!

Gameboy Controls:

a: select

b: back

Keyboard Controls:

arrow keys: movement

z: select, action

x: back

enter: start over

k: stats

Tips:

If you run out of jokes or energy, visit the computer in your office to get more.  It'll cost you time though, so be careful!

Jokes can freeze a worker and don't cost a turn!  You only get 3 though!  

Convince someone to go back to work in 3 turns or less, and you don't lose any time!

Not everyone reacts the same to your actions.  Learn what works best for the personality of each worker!
